Summary: came out of the ocean,straight up very slowly made right turn the was gone
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my patio watching the sun set. On the herrizone I saw this object that looked like it was coming out of the ocean. I made a commit to my customer to look. No one could figure out what it was. By now there is about 30 people outside looking. It came straight up out over the water. Very slowly and made no sound. It was round looked like it had windows with red lights in the middle and one solid white light under the bottom they did not blink, but they were bright. When it got over the land it continaled for another 7 to 10 mins. It was all most dark. we tryed to get a picture but no one had a camra. One of my workers took a picture with his cell phone but it looked like a light could not make it out.Then it took a right turn and flew for another 3 or 4 mins, Then matter of seconds it was gone
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Panama City Beach
There were no other sightings in Panama City Beach on or around July 15th 2012
